_comment1: Persistent information the UW BIOFAB Accuri flow cytometer

tasbe_cytometer_configuration._comment1: the rdf:about field is a URI that persistently identifies this instrument and optical configuration
tasbe_cytometer_configuration._comment2: Compatible TASBE interface version, following Semantic Versioning (semver.org).  Note that underspecifying version allows use of backward compatible upgrades.
tasbe_cytometer_configuration._comment3: the channels for the instrument are fixed
